summary: Adds more detail and foliage to Riverwood and the area around it.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/H69ap.png[/IMG][/center]

[b][center]With this mod I plan to make Riverwood a much more lush and pretty. Turning what was a (almost) barren grassland into a beautiful green paradise.[/center][/b]

[center][b]Development Phases[/b][/center]
[center]Currently in Phase: [b]TWO![/b][/center]
----------------------------------
[center]Phase Descriptions[/center]
[b]Phase One[/b] - Adding big things such as trees, ferns, stumps, logs, etc.
[b]Phase Two[/b] - Adds more river details, rocks, splashes, ripples, etc.
[b]Phase Three[/b] - Adds small details around the forest and town such as clover patches, bushes, flowers, etc.
author: UberOstrich

files.name: Lush Riverwood Beta
files.changelogHtml:
Added wet rocks around a small island with a fallen tree, creating a natural bridge.
Added more detail.
